verses.verse: "For behold, <S%H2009><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> is coming, <S%H935><s%> burning <S%H1197><s%> like a furnace; <S%H8574><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the arrogant <S%H2086><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> evildoer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H7564><s%> will be chaff; <S%H7179><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> that is coming <S%H935><s%> will set <S%H3857><s%> them ablaze, <S%H3857><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "so <S%H834><s%> that it will leave <S%H5800><s%> them neither <S%H3808><s%> root <S%H8328><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> branch. <S%H6057><s%>"

"But for you who fear <S%H3372><s%> My name <S%H8034><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> will rise <S%H2224><s%> with healing <S%H4832><s%> in its wings; <S%H3671><s%> and you will go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> and skip <S%H6335><s%> about <S%H6335><s%> like calves <S%H5695><s%> from the stall. <S%H4770><s%>

"And you will tread <S%H6072><s%> down <S%H6072><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> for they shall be ashes <S%H665><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am preparing, <S%H6213><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> My servant, <S%H5650><s%> [even the] statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> him in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to send <S%H7971><s%> you Elijah <S%H452><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the coming <S%H935><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And he will restore <S%H7725><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the fathers to [their] children, <S%H1><s%> and the hearts <S%H1121><s%> of the children <S%H3820><s%> to their fathers, lest <S%H1121><s%> I come <S%H1><s%> and smite <S%H6435><s%> the land <S%H935><s%> with a curse. <S%H5221><s%>"
